publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1632 Sarah Boyack: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2001—That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2001 be approved.
